member.name: IAccDictionary.ConvertValueToString

summary.para: Clients call the IAccDictionary.ConvertValueToString method to convert a value to a localized string.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: A GUID that represents a property.
The locale of the string to be returned.
A pointer to the converted value.
A pointer to the language of the returned string.

member.name: IAccDictionary.GetLocalizedString

summary.para: Clients call the IAccDictionary.GetLocalizedString method to get localized strings for all system properties and their values.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: A globally unique identifier (GUID) that represents a property.
The locale of the string to be returned.
A localized string that represents the term.
The language of the returned string.

member.name: IAccDictionary.GetMnemonicString

summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: A mnemonic string for the property. This string is not localized.

member.name: IAccDictionary.GetParentTerm

summary.para: Clients call the IAccDictionary.GetParentTerm method to navigate through the object hierarchy tree. This method returns the parent object of a specified property.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: The parent of the property specified in the Term parameter.

member.name: IAccDictionary.LookupMnemonicTerm

summary.para: Clients call the IAccDictionary.LookupMnemonicTerm method to find the property for a given mnemonic string.
summary.div: Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

member.param: A non-localized mnemonic string for a property.
A GUID representing the property in bstrMnemonic.
